section.class: content-container events1-container slick-container content-size-small orientation-horizontal date-orientation-horizontal

div.h2: The Tyrrell County Schools System dedicates its efforts to developing a responsible and productive citizenry, well equipped to meet the challenges of the 21st century. We will accomplish this mission through the commitment and cooperation of our diverse community.

section.class: content-container news1-container slick-container content-size-small orientation-horizontal thumbnail-orientation-vertical

img.alt: TCS Feeding Program Suspended Through Spring Break

h3.a: TCS Feeding Program Suspended During Spring Break

div.div:
Please note that the Tyrrell County Schools Feeding Program will not be in service during Spring Break, which begins Friday, April 10 and goes through the following week.
Tenga en cuenta que el Programa de Alimentación de las Escuelas del Condado de Tyrrell no estará en servicio durante las vacaciones de primavera, que comienza el viernes 10 de abril y continúa hasta la semana siguiente.
